titles.title: SNOOP Act of 2025
SNOOP Act of 2025
Stop the Nosy Obsession with Online Payments Act of 2025

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the exception for de minimis payments by third party settlement organizations with respect to returns relating to payments made in settlement of payment card and third party network transactions, as in effect prior to the enactment of the American Rescue Plan Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
